ModuleDescription: This experiential and case-based learning module will provide an innovation and entrepreneurial strategy framework for students who are interested to engage in innovation-based entrepreneurship. The module aims to provide an in-depth understanding of technological innovations, strategic choices confronting innovators interested in start-ups and commercialization, and a framework for the development and implementation of entrepreneurial ventures and business plans in dynamic environments. Major topics such as leveraging open innovation, selecting an appropriate market, innovation and IP strategy, as well as strategic learning and experimentation in entrepreneurial strategy will be covered.
